name: AdultPneumococcalVaccineAdministered
title: Adult Pneumococcal Vaccine Administered
purpose: (Clinical Focus: The purpose of this value set is to represent concepts for an adult pneumococcal vaccination.),(Data Element Scope: This value set may use a model element related to Procedure.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes concepts that represent a 13-valent, 15-valent, 20-valent, 23-valent or unspecified formulation pneumococcal vaccination (for codes that exist).),(Exclusion Criteria: Excludes concepts that represent a pneumococcal conjugate 7-valent and 10-valent vaccination.)

concept.display: Pneumococcal conjugate vaccine, 13 valent (PCV13), for intramuscular use
Pneumococcal conjugate vaccine, 15 valent (PCV15), for intramuscular use
Pneumococcal conjugate vaccine, 20 valent (PCV20), for intramuscular use
Pneumococcal polysaccharide vaccine, 23-valent (PPSV23), adult or immunosuppressed patient dosage, when administered to individuals 2 years or older, for subcutaneous or intramuscular use
